overview: After being saved from a violent confrontation by Arjun, Underworld Don Kaalkeshwar Singh invites the man to his country estate. Kaalkeshwar introduces Arjun to his wife Monica, over whom he is very protective. Then, when it emerges that Arjun and Monica have engaged in an affair, Kaalkeshwar's is enraged and seeks revenge.
title: Kaala Samrajya
